title: PBE - Can't Connect From OCE
body:
Hi,

I am a player on OCE servers, who just made a PBE account from my current main account (since its open for sign ups). I logged into my new account - very excited to see the new runes and make some pages and test them out. I then queued up and waited for a game, and got into champ select with no issues whatsoever. Picked and banned champions and the game was about to commence. 

After the pick phase however, when you are meant to see the loading screen, I only saw a black screen and a message that popped up repeatedly:

Error: Failed to connect
"Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game."

I would just like to know why this is happening... My internet is fine normally. Is it because the PBE servers are in North America, and because I am in Australia? If this is the reason, does that mean I will never be able to play on PBE?

~Thanks and sorry if this is on the wrong board... (didn't know where to put it)

{{summoner:4}} {{summoner:14}}  For the kill every time...

replies.body:
Riot don't want to make a PBE server outside of the one they already have... 

The 250 ping is a result of you being in Australia, and the server being hosted in America (mind you though, Australia's poor internet standards are partly to blame for this).

You get 18 ping on the OCE servers because they are hosted in Brisbane (I think). I get about 38 ping normally on OCE servers and I get about 300 ping when I'm playing on PBE.

It is sad, but Rito have not announced plans to put a second PBE server up anywhere... Also I doubt the first region they would choose to put a second PBE server would be in OCE if they happened to decide to make a new PBE server.

Cri, we can only hope.

On the bright side though... PBE works at least and you can try out the new runes and see the changes earlier :)

UPDATE: It is working now... I can get onto practice tool and custom games. I haven't tried an actual game yet though! 

However sometimes it bugsplats and forces a repair so you have to wait about half an hour to get back into the game.

If it bugsplats again I'll "run a tracert to this IP: 104.160.129.226 and post the results here"

Thanks for the quick fix!

Hi guys, we've made some configuration changes, can I get you to try playing a game on PBE again?

If you're still not able to connect, can you please run a tracert to this IP: 104.160.129.226 and post the results here
It works, but training always bug splats and forces a repair.
sane thing happening riot should hop on this
Same here, and tried most of the possible things (Change DNS, Firewall, etc...)
i have the same issue i havnt been able to have a single game, practice mode, custom no matter what i cant play. just want to know whats wrong :)
I am experiencing the same thing on  OCE,.although not PBE :( Trying to figure it out now
